Class Implementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.ctddev.Zemtsov.implementor.Implementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler

    public class Implementor
extends Object
implements info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.JarImpler
    The Implementor class is used to create class implementing given interface or extending given class
    See Also:
    JarImpler
